comments:
Using I20050627-1435

After having started Eclipse, I immediately clicked on the Package Explorer, but
got the following exception:

After that I had to restart eclipse as the package explorer could not recover
from this exception.

However: I could not reproduce this exception! I'm not sure but this might have
happened as some background jobs still were running in Eclipse (like building
the workspace and initializing the java components).
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 85881 ***
